parsed.title: O mito que financiou a catedral
parsed.summary: Um mito sangrento usado para legitimar um ataque infantil revela como um decreto e a confiscação de bens alimentaram o poder da igreja, enquanto o ouro desaparecia na mesma noite. O silêncio do relatório deixa a verdade oculta, provocando indignação e curiosidade.

scenes.narration: Um mito sangrento. [pause] Uma criança desapareceu, e o bispo assinou o decreto.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, ancient church archive with sealed parchment bearing a crimson seal, wide shot, low angle, cold blue shadows, light filtering through stained glass, dust motes swirling
scenes.motionDescription: slow dolly forward towards the parchment, subtle dust particles drifting in the light
scenes.audioDescription: distant choir echo, parchment rustle, low organ drone

scenes.narration: O decreto confiscou bens, financiando a catedral e silenciando vozes do clero.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, massive ledger open on a wooden desk, gold coins spilling, candlelight flickering, close-up of inked decree, shallow depth of field
scenes.motionDescription: slow pan across the ledger, focus shifts to the spilling coins
scenes.audioDescription: soft coin clink, candle flame crackle, quiet scribble

scenes.narration: O relatório nunca encontrou a criança, mas o ouro desapareceu na mesma noite.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, modern surveillance room with glowing monitors, one screen displays the ancient decree, another shows a blank file labeled 'Child', red warning overlay, cold teal backlight, subtle screen flicker
scenes.motionDescription: slow zoom into the monitor showing the blank file, then a quick cut to the decree screen
scenes.audioDescription: computer hum, distant newsroom static, faint heartbeat

scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, black void with faint logo, minimal light, no movement

backgroundMusic.prompt: Dark Ambient, Low Drone, Tension Strings, Subtle Piano, Mysterious, Cinematic, Atmospheric, 90 BPM
